description: Candelabrum; Attributed to Pierre-Philippe Thomire (French, 1751 - 1843, master 1772), and Louis-Simon Boizot (French, 1743 - 1809), and after a design attributed to Jean-Demosthene Dugourc (French, 1749 - 1825); Paris, France; about 1785; Gilt and patinated bronze; white and griotte marbles; 83.2 x 29.2 cm (32 3/4 x 11 1/2 in.); 86.DF.521.1; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
